body_html:
This also works

indices = tf.constant([[4], [3], [1], [7]])
updates = tf.constant([9., 10., 11., 12.], dtype=tf.float32)
shape = tf.constant([8])
scatter = tf.scatter_nd(indices, updates, shape)
sess = tf.Session()
print(sess.run(scatter))

body:
This also works

```
indices = tf.constant([[4], [3], [1], [7]])
updates = tf.constant([9., 10., 11., 12.], dtype=tf.float32)
shape = tf.constant([8])
scatter = tf.scatter_nd(indices, updates, shape)
sess = tf.Session()
print(sess.run(scatter))
```
